state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an life changing round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to make an attempt to move north. That done, try to travel east. And then, make an attempt to head north. Then, attempt to venture east. With that done, go south. And then, make an attempt to go to the west. That done, attempt to go to the west. After that, try to travel south. With that done, make an effort to go west. And then, go to the west. Once you accomplish that, go south. Then, attempt to venture east. Then, make an attempt to take a trip east. Following that, make an attempt to venture north. Next, lift the coin from the floor of the basement. Alright, thanks! -= Pantry =- You arrive in a pantry. An ordinary kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Pantry =-0/1
